mapper.select: SELECT id, advisor_id, advisor_name, advisor_type, advisor_desc, advisor_order, advisor_param, advisor_status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_advisor WHERE advisor_id = #{advisorId}

SELECT id, advisor_id, advisor_name, advisor_type, advisor_desc, advisor_order, advisor_param, advisor_status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_advisor
AND advisor_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{idKeyword}, '%')
AND advisor_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nameKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY update_time DESC, id DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ai_advisor
AND advisor_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{idKeyword}, '%')
AND advisor_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nameKeyword}, '%')
SELECT id, advisor_id, advisor_name, advisor_type, advisor_desc, advisor_order, advisor_param, advisor_status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_advisor WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_advisor (advisor_id, advisor_name, advisor_type, advisor_desc, advisor_order, advisor_param, advisor_status) VALUES (#{advisorId}, #{advisorName}, #{advisorType}, #{advisorDesc}, #{advisorOrder}, #{advisorParam}, #{advisorStatus})
